casebody.data:
[No. 405. Decided February 10, 1892.] Chauncy W. Griggs, Respondent, v. The City of Tacoma, Grattan H. Wheeler, Treasurer, and Charles E. Hill, City Clerk, Appellants. Eben Pierce, Mary E. Howell, Pierce Loan and Investment Company, and George P. Lee, Respondents, v. The City of Tacoma, Grattan H. Wheeler, Treasurer, and Charles E. Hill, City Clerk, Appellants. [No. 403.

Decided February 10, 1892.]

Appeal from Superior Court, Pierce County. S. C. Milligan and M. B. Hoxie, for appellants. Seymour, Griggs & Lockwood, for respondents. Hoyt, J.

These cases present the same questions as that of Howell v. Tacoma, ante, p. 711, and for the reasons stated in the opinion in that case, the judgments must be affirmed.

Anders, O. J., and Scott, Dunbar and Stiles, JJ., concur-
